text: Nicole wants her husband Keith to join her in drama Big Little Lies ( Picture : Kevork Djansezian / Getty Images ) Nicole Kidman has revealed that she wants her country crooner hubby Keith Urban to appear in the new series of Big Little Lies. The 50 - year - old Australian actress – who won a Golden Globe this year for her role as Celeste Wright in the smash hit HBO series – is turning on the charm to try and convince Keith, 50, to join her on screen. However, as the couple spoke to Entertainment Tonight at the American Country Music Awards, it appears that the You ’ ll Think of Me singer isn ’ t so keen on moving over from the music studio to the movie set.
